Question: He had another son, born on August 15, 1917, with girlfriend Bessie Poole, named William Rexford **** Morris.
Hints: This person had a substantial library in his home.
His father visited him for two months in England when this person was performing there in music halls.
This person played himself in Never Give a Sucker an Even Break, and his "niece" called him "Uncle Bill".
